short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple context menu entry that allows you to search www.culpa.info by highlighting the professor or class that you're interested in.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a simple extension that allows you to highlight a professor's name (or class), and search it using www.culpa.info

DISCLAIMER: I am in no way associated with www.culpa.info
